about_the_game:
The Maker's Eden is a first-person hypertext adventure game presented in the style of a motion comic. You play a character trying to discover what their predefined purpose is, in a science fiction/noir inspired world filled with androids, flying cars and an early 20th century vibe.

The game has been built around the music from the beginning and the tracks are a combination of smooth jazzy sounds with electronica.

Tracks - Act 1:
01 - Iron Skies (Introduction Theme)
02 - A Lost Soul (Title Music)
03 - Delicate Machinery (Atmospheric Gameplay)
04 - An Unlikely Sleuth (Exploration Gameplay)
05 - Boilerplate Prison (Cinematic Gameplay)
06 - Surveillance Drone
07 - Stasis Pod Dreams

Tracks - Act 2:
01 - More is Revealed
02 - In the Darkened Rain (Title Theme)
03 - Treading Lightly (Atmospheric Gameplay)
04 - An Unlikely Alliance (Exploration Gameplay)
05 - Giving Chase (Cinematic Gameplay)
06 - Power Station
07 - A Perfect Future
